24.brief: as, like as, how, while, so that
24.long: as, like as, about, as it were, according as, how, when, while, as soon as, so that.
(a) I instruct, command, (b) I appoint, assign.

24.brief: he, she, it, they, them, same
24.long: he, she, it, they, them, same.
a messenger, generally a (supernatural) messenger from God, an angel, conveying news or behests from God to men.
I take from, receive from, or: I take to, receive (apparently not used of money), admit, acknowledge; I take with me.

24.brief: he, she, it, they, them, same
24.long: he, she, it, they, them, same.

25.brief: I come to know, learn, realize
25.long: I am taking in knowledge, come to know, learn; aor: I ascertained, realized.

25.brief: he, she, it, they, them, same
25.long: he, she, it, they, them, same.
(a) conj: until, (b) prep: as far as, up to, as much as, until.
I bear, bring forth, produce, beget, yield.
(a) I call, summon, invite, (b) I call, name.

25.brief: he, she, it, they, them, same
25.long: he, she, it, they, them, same.
Jesus; the Greek form of Joshua; Jesus, son of Eliezer; Jesus, surnamed Justus.
